comment: /** * Provides the {@link Setting setting configuration} for each internal realm type. * This excludes the ReservedRealm, as it cannot be configured dynamically. */
code: /** * Provides the {@link Setting setting configuration} for each internal realm type. * This excludes the ReservedRealm, as it cannot be configured dynamically. */ public static Set> getSettings() { Set> set = new HashSet<>(). set.addAll(FileRealmSettings.getSettings()). set.addAll(NativeRealmSettings.getSettings()). set.addAll(LdapRealmSettings.getSettings(LdapRealmSettings.AD_TYPE)). set.addAll(LdapRealmSettings.getSettings(LdapRealmSettings.LDAP_TYPE)). set.addAll(PkiRealmSettings.getSettings()). set.addAll(SamlRealmSettings.getSettings()). set.addAll(KerberosRealmSettings.getSettings()). return Collections.unmodifiableSet(set). }
